channel.title: xcode on PR
channel.description: Recent content in xcode on PR

item.title: Swift/Objective-C Interoperability - Behind the "Configure Bridging Header" dialog
item.description: Disclaimer: Yes, I know about the typo “briding” in screenshots, but I’m lazy to redo all, so please ignore and read the article in peace :-)

item.title: Image Slicing (Repeatable image) with Xcode Asset Catalog
item.description: Image slicing option in xcode asset catalog allows you to define resiziable area an image so it can be repeated to fit the object’s height & width.

item.title: Expired distribution provisioning and Yak shaving
item.description: Last Thursday one of my iPad app’s provisioning file has expired. Client brought it to us at the very late moment, the iPad app was distributed internally as an enterprise app.

item.title: Installing more simulators for xcode 4.2 without re-downloading everytime
item.description: If you are like me, who use more than one machine to develop iOS app and wants to install 4.x and 3.

item.title: BTServer CPU Usage
item.description: I recently uninstalled all previous versions of xcode (I had all xcode from ios 3.2.x) to install 4.2 on my MBP.
